articles.title: UPI payment charges explained: Why FinMin had to clarify there's no move to levy fee - The Indian Express
articles.description: Terming UPI services as a "digital public good", the Finance Ministry stepped in on Sunday to clarify that the concerns for the service providers for cost recovery have to be met through other means.
